# <a name="ca2361-ensure-autogenerated-class-containing-datasetreadxml-is-not-used-with-untrusted-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-103">CA2361：確認不會搭配不受信任的資料使用包含 DataSet.ReadXml() 的自動產生類別</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-103">CA2361: Ensure autogenerated class containing DataSet.ReadXml() is not used with untrusted data</span></span>

| | <span data-ttu-id="71129-104">值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-104">Value</span></span> |
|-|-|
| <span data-ttu-id="71129-105">**規則識別碼**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-105">**Rule ID**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="71129-106">CA2361</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-106">CA2361</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="71129-107">**類別**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-107">**Category**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="71129-108">Microsoft.Security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-108">Microsoft.Security</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="71129-109">**修正程式中斷或未中斷**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-109">**Fix is breaking or non-breaking**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="71129-110">非中斷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-110">Non-breaking</span></span>|

## <a name="cause"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-111">原因</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-111">Cause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-112"><xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫或參考方法，並在自動產生的程式碼內。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-112">The <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method was called or referenced, and is within autogenerated code.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-113">此規則會將自動產生的程式碼 b 分類：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-113">This rule classifies autogenerated code b:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="71129-114">在名為的方法內 `ReadXmlSerializable` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-114">Being inside a method named `ReadXmlSerializable`.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="71129-115">`ReadXmlSerializable`方法有 <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-115">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method has a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="71129-116">`ReadXmlSerializable`方法位於具有的型別中 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-116">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method is within a type that has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-117">當出現在非自動產生的程式碼中時， [CA2351](ca2351.md)是類似的規則 <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-117">[CA2351](ca2351.md) is a similar rule, for when <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> appears within non-autogenerated code.</span></span>

## <a name="rule-description"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-118">規則描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-118">Rule description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-119"><xref:System.Data.DataSet>使用不受信任的輸入還原序列化時，攻擊者可以製作惡意輸入來執行阻斷服務攻擊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-119">When deserializing a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with untrusted input, an attacker can craft malicious input to perform a denial of service attack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-120">可能有未知的遠端程式碼執行弱點。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-120">There may be unknown remote code execution vulnerabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-121">這項規則就像是 [CA2351](ca2351.md)，但適用于 GUI 應用程式內資料的記憶體內部表示的自動產生程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-121">This rule is like [CA2351](ca2351.md), but for autogenerated code for an in-memory representation of data within a GUI application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-122">通常，這些自動產生的類別不會從不受信任的輸入還原序列化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-122">Usually, these autogenerated classes aren't deserialized from untrusted input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-123">您應用程式的使用方式可能會有所不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-123">Your application's usage may vary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71129-124">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料集和 DataTable 安全性指引](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-124">For more information, see [DataSet and DataTable security guidance](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md).</span></span>

## <a name="how-to-fix-violations"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-125">如何修正違規</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-125">How to fix violations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="71129-126">可能的話，請使用 [Entity Framework](/ef/) 而不是 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-126">If possible, use [Entity Framework](/ef/) rather than the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="71129-127">使序列化的資料無法進行篡改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-127">Make the serialized data tamper-proof.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-128">在序列化之後，以密碼編譯方式簽署序列化的資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-128">After serialization, cryptographically sign the serialized data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-129">在還原序列化之前，請先驗證密碼編譯簽章。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-129">Before deserialization, validate the cryptographic signature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71129-130">保護密碼編譯金鑰免于洩漏和設計金鑰輪替。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-130">Protect the cryptographic key from being disclosed and design for key rotations.</span></span>

## <a name="when-to-suppress-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-131">隱藏警告的時機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-131">When to suppress warnings</span></span>

[!INCLUDE[insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress](~/includes/code-analysis/insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress.md)]

## <a name="pseudo-code-examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-132">虛擬程式碼範例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-132">Pseudo-code examples</span></span>

### <a name="violation"></a><span data-ttu-id="71129-133">違規</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71129-133">Violation</span></span>

```csharp
namespace ExampleNamespace
{
    /// <summary>
    ///Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.
    ///</summary>
    [global::System.Serializable()]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute("code")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(true)]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaProviderAttribute("GetTypedDataSetSchema")]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute("Package")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute("vs.data.DataSet")]
    public partial class Something : global::System.Data.DataSet {

        [global::System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute()]
        [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator", "4.0.0.0")]
        protected override void ReadXmlSerializable(global::System.Xml.XmlReader reader) {
            if ((this.DetermineSchemaSerializationMode(reader) == global::System.Data.SchemaSerializationMode.IncludeSchema)) {
                this.Reset();
                global::System.Data.DataSet ds = new global::System.Data.DataSet();
                ds.ReadXml(reader);
                if ((ds.Tables["Something"] != null)) {
                    base.Tables.Add(new SomethingTable(ds.Tables["Something"]));
                }
                this.DataSetName = ds.DataSetName;
                this.Prefix = ds.Prefix;
                this.Namespace = ds.Namespace;
                this.Locale = ds.Locale;
                this.CaseSensitive = ds.CaseSensitive;
                this.EnforceConstraints = ds.EnforceConstraints;
                this.Merge(ds, false, global::System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.Add);
                this.InitVars();
            }
            else {
                this.ReadXml(reader);
                this.InitVars();
            }
        }
    }
}
```
